definition: to raise one's voice/to speak at the top of one's voice
to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to cry out loud without tears
to yell/to shout/to call out for (a person)
to cry out/to bark out a sound
to shout/to bawl/to yell (to urge on an animal)/to hawk (one's wares)/to denounce loudly/to shout slogans
to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
to argue noisily/to shout/to make widely known/to reproach
to straighten (by pulling or stretching)/to be even (neither side losing out)
